topic.title: When uploading an album, "Reading song info" message lasts... forever?
topic.body: My 2nd time trying to upload an album, and again I just get "Reading song info..." and it's been an hour. What is supposed to happen?

1547579440_131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5.body: @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk: Do you use ZeroLSTN, ZeroMusic or any other 0net-based music source? So far I've only been able to play about 5 songs.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_10_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): OFFTOPIC POST:@klu9 yes, this is problem that there is no mechanism on many sites which would remove long term unseeded files. KopyKate can also be used to share music. https://rg3.github.io/youtube-dl/ and other downloaders can download audio only in webm format so it can be added as a video on a site like kopykate and also there is IFS and Kxovid, but none is easy to use as a media player (usually no playlist functionality, low number of content) so far.ZeroLSTN is most close to nice music library site.

Thanks for the info. I guess I'll stick with Spotify for now.
